Earthquake Tracker & Monitor

Stay informed about seismic activity worldwide. Get real-time earthquake alerts, detailed maps, and safety tips.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

Earthquake Tracker & Monitor helps you stay aware of seismic events as they happen. Track earthquakes globally, receive instant notifications for significant tremors, and access historical data and safety resources—all in one intuitive app.

Key features

Live earthquake map

View recent earthquakes on an interactive map with magnitude, depth, and location details.

Real-time alerts

Get instant notifications for significant seismic activity near your location or worldwide.

Detailed event info

Access comprehensive data for each event, including time, coordinates, and affected regions.

Historical data

Browse past earthquakes and analyze trends over time.

Customizable notifications

Set alert thresholds by magnitude and region to get only the updates you care about. (coming soon)

Safety resources

Learn what to do before, during, and after an earthquake with built-in safety guides. (coming soon)

How it works

  1. Monitor: Open the app to see the latest earthquakes on a live map.
  2. Get alerts: Receive push notifications for significant events based on your preferences.
  3. Explore details: Tap any event for in-depth information and historical context.
  4. Stay safe: Access quick safety tips and preparedness resources anytime.

Screenshots

Get Earthquake Tracker

FAQ

Where does the earthquake data come from?

The US Geological Survey (USGS) and updated in real time.

Can I customize which alerts I receive?

Yes, you can set your own thresholds for magnitude and regions to control notifications.

Does the app work worldwide?

Yes, Earthquake Tracker covers seismic activity across the globe.

Is an internet connection required?

An internet connection is needed to receive real-time updates and notifications.

Is my location data private?

Your privacy is important. Location is only used for alert customization and is never shared. See our Privacy Policy for details.

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
